oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dude Ranch / NBC's Saturday Showcase - 1947-09-06 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: KVOO, Tulsa, OK radio program Dude Ranch, featuring the Sons Of The Range (including Cy Tuma) and Taudie Dalton (with pianist Bill Simon), with guests Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band (including Jimmy Hall). Originally broadcast 1947-09-06 (part 1), this episode was featured as part of NBC's Saturday Showcase series. Other personnel include announcer Johnny Ryan, producer Jim Randolph, and music supervisor Joe O'Neil.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sons Of The Range; Taudie Dalton; Leon McAuliffe; Western Swing Band (Leon McAuliffe); Gay Robins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (A Cowboy Has To Sing) -- Opening statement (Johnny Ryan) -- I'm An Old Cowhand (From The Rio Grande) (Taudie Dalton, Sons Of The Range) -- Cy Tuma and Taudie Dalton introduce Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band -- Steel Guitar Rag (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Cy Tuma and Leon McAuliffe talk -- Stop Cracking Peanuts (Sons Of The Range) -- Cy Tuma, Leon McAuliffe, and Taudie Dalton talk -- A Cowboy's Christmas Song (Jimmy Hall vocals, Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Taudie Dalton, Leon McAuliffe, and Cy Tuma talk -- Barbara Polka (Sons Of The Range) -- Cy Tuma and Leon McAuliffe introduce the Gay Robins -- I Cover The Waterfront (Gay Robins) -- Leon McAuliffe, Cy Tuma, and Taudie Dalton talk [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KVOO (Radio station : Tulsa, Okla.); Dude ranch (Radio program); National Broadcasting Company; Saturday showcase (Radio program); Sons of the Range (Musical group); Dalton, Taudie; McAuliffe, Leon, 1917-1988; Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe); Tuma, Cy; Gay Robins (Musical group); Simon, William N., 1916-; Ryan, Johnny (Announcer); Randolph, Jim; O'Neil, Joe (Musician)
